name: Angel Falls Adventure
description: Embark on an adventure to Angel Falls, the world's highest uninterrupted waterfall, located in the heart of Canaima National Park.

name: Explore Los Roques Archipelago
description: Discover the pristine beauty of Los Roques Archipelago, a national park known for its crystal-clear waters, coral reefs, and diverse marine life.

name: Roraima Trekking Expedition
description: Embark on a challenging trek to Roraima, a flat-topped mountain in the Gran Sabana region, and explore its unique landscapes and ecosystems.

name: Visit the Historic City of Coro
description: Explore the historic city of Coro, a UNESCO World Heritage site, known for its colonial architecture, museums, and cultural heritage.

name: Canaima Lagoon Boat Tour
description: Take a boat tour on Canaima Lagoon, surrounded by stunning tepui formations, and visit the iconic Ucaima Falls.

name: Merida's Andean Adventures
description: Explore the Andean landscapes of Merida, offering opportunities for trekking, paragliding, and enjoying the natural beauty of the region.

name: Morrocoy National Park Beaches
description: Relax on the pristine beaches of Morrocoy National Park, an archipelago with calm turquoise waters and white sandy shores.

name: Orinoco Delta Exploration
description: Explore the rich biodiversity of the Orinoco Delta, home to diverse wildlife and indigenous communities, with canoe tours and wildlife watching.

name: Médanos de Coro Sand Dunes
description: Visit the Médanos de Coro, a unique desert landscape with vast sand dunes perfect for sandboarding and photography.

name: Caracas City Tour
description: Take a city tour of Caracas, the capital of Venezuela, and explore its museums, historic sites, and cultural attractions.
